name: When u go to the arcade and u go on bumper cars first
name_original: When u go to the arcade and u go on bumper cars first
description:
When u go to the arcade and u go on bumper cars first is a game developed by Fadeaway899. It was originally released in 2021.
When u go to the arcade and u go on bumper cars first is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
